description: Fit, chiseled hunk Justin Matthews has been following tattooed, muscular Vadim Black on social media for quite some time now, and admittedly has an insane crush on him. He decides to book a trip to his home state hoping that he will actually get to meet him. To his surprise, he runs into Vadim on a tennis court, and they immediately hit it off. They end up going on a lunch date that ends with a savory side of ass for dessert.
title: Done Waiting Part 3
